entry.title: Git Handbook
entry.content: I used to think I know all the necessary things about git. But, a few days back I met a git guru who deleted a commit from the commit history within a few seconds in front of me while I didn’t know about deleting a commit. This incident intrigued me to solidify my knowledge about git which I use almost every day.
entry.summary: I used to think I know all the necessary things about git. But, a few days back I met a git guru who deleted a commit from the commit history within a few seconds in front of me while I didn’t know about deleting a commit. This incident intrigued me to solidify my knowledge about git which I use almost every day.
